import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Swal from 'sweetalert2' import axios from "axios"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { Button, Modal, ModalHeader, ModalBody, ModalFooter, Label, Input, FormGroup } from 'reactstrap'; import Upimg from './Upimg'; function Index() { const [modaladd, setModaladd] = useState(false); const add = () => setModaladd(!modaladd); const [modalupdate, setModalupdate] = useState(false); const update = () => setModalupdate(!modalupdate); const [modaldelet, setModaldelet] = useState(false); const delet = () => setModaldelet(!modaldelet); const navigator = useNavigate() const [data, setData] = useState({ name: '', nameProduc: '', description: '', price: '', amount: '', selectedFile: null }) const [eliminar, setEliminar] = useState({ id: '', }) function handle(e) { e.preventDefault(); const newdata = { ...data } newdata[e.target.id] = e.target.value setData(newdata) console.log(newdata) } function handledelet(e) { e.preventDefault(); const newdata = { ...eliminar } newdata[e.target.id] = e.target.value setEliminar(newdata) console.log(newdata) } const EnviarDelet = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const id = id console.log(id) axios.delete(`http://localhost:3000/api/product/delete?id=${id}`) .then(res => console.log(res)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) Swal.fire({ title: 'Eliminando...', text: 'Usuario de Id: ' + id + ' Eliminado', icon: 'warning', confirmButtonText: 'Ok' }) } const handleFileSelected = (e) => { const files = Array.from(e.target.files) console.log("files:", files); if (files && files.length > 0) { const newdata = { ...data } newdata["selectedFile"] = files[0]; setData(newdata) } } const url = 'http://localhost:3000/api/product/create' function Enviar() { const formData = new FormData(); formData.append("name", data.selectedFile); formData.append("nameProduc", data.nameProduc); formData.append("description", data.description); formData.append("price", data.price); formData.append("amount", data.amount); axios.post(url, formData) .then(res => { console.log(res) console.log(res.length) if (res.status === 200) { Swal.fire({ title: 'Que bien', text: "Se agrego nuevo producto!", icon: 'success', confirmButtonColor: '#0e46ff', confirmButtonText: 'Okay' }).then((result) => { if (result.isConfirmed) { window.location.replace('/Index'); } }) } else { Swal.fire( 'ATENCIÃ“N', 'Ha ocurrido un error al guardar la imagen, reintente', 'warning' ); } }) add(false); } return (

); } export default Index;
